name: Randalf Gun Magic
description:
Help the powerful Randalf clear the cursed Skull Peak and protect the world from the horrible creatures it spawns.
When magic proves inefficient, use the full might of GUN MAGIC to help you succeed in your goal!
Rescue lost magicians and gather more powerful weapons in this rogue-like dungeon crawler shooter made with Unity 

#unity #gamedev #indiedev #indiegame #roguelike #8bit #retro
